<small>Aramaic form: **<big>[[H6537|פְּרַס]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַס‎</span>, erroneous <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַשׂ‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZA i, 417</sup>] **verb** ==break in two, divide== (Late Hebrew in derived forms; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***parâsu***</u></abbr>, ***divide, hinder***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***break*** neck, etc.; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hoof***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְסְחָא‎</span> (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְסָה‎</span> below); compare [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZA i.417 f.</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּפָֽרְשׂוּ‎</span> [[Mic.3.3|Mic 3:3]] ***they have broken up*** bones, as in kettle (? read Imperfect <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִפְרְשׂוּ‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>i.c</sup>.); ***Infinitive abs***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרֹס לָרָעֵב לַחְמֶ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Isa.58.7|Isa 58:7]] ***a breaking for the hungry thy bread***, so ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרְסוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָהֶם‎</span> [[Jer.16.7|Jer 16:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם‎</span> omitted; but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם אֶלאָֿבֵל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפ‎</span> [[BDB#Gie|Gie]], compare [in part] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] Valgate [[BDB#Gf|Gf]]); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹרֵשׂ לֶהֶם‎</span> [[Lam.4.4|Lam 4:4]] (accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֶחֶם‎</span> omitted). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִפְרִיסָה‎</span> [[Lev.11.6|Lev 11:6]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַפְרִיס‎</span> v[[Lev.11.5|Lev 11:5]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַפְרִיס‎</span> v[[Lev.11.4|Lev 11:4]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַפְרֶסֶת‎</span> v[[Lev.11.3|Lev 11:3]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּרְסָה‎</span> ***divide hoof***, i.e. have divided hoof (&gt; denominative ***have hoofs***, [[Deut.14.6|Deut 14:6]]; [[Deut.14.7|Deut 14:7]]; [[Deut.14.8|Deut 14:8]] and \|\| [[Lev.11.3|Lev 11:3]]; [[Lev.11.4|Lev 11:4]]; [[Lev.11.5|Lev 11:5]]; [[Lev.11.6|Lev 11:6]]; [[Lev.11.7|Lev 11:7]], so also [[Lev.11.26|Lev 11:26]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַפְרִיסֵי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפ‎</span> [[Deut.14.7|Deut 14:7]] = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַפְרִסֵי הַפ‎</span> [[Lev.11.4|Lev 11:4]] ([[BDB#H|H]]). 

**2.** participle absolute denominative [[Ps.69.32|Ps 69:32]] ***having hoofs*** (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְרִן‎</span>).
